Hello, my name is Roman Filipenko! I am a frontend developer from Russia.

About me

I know basics of JavaScript and HTML, as well as bundlers such as: Gulp and Webpack. For version control system i use git.
I have knowledge of React, as I used it in a couple of my projects.
My goals is to grow from junior frontend developer to a fullstack developer.
